title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap in any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode) installable via Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting, managing models and viewing logs from the terminal; built with Python Rich.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Local GitHub Copilot replacement: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: ingest PDFs → Chroma → Ollama embeddings & chat, all running locally.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync & async APIs, Spring Boot starter on Maven Central.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift package that wraps the Ollama REST API for native macOS/iOS apps.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to spin up GPU-enabled EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed and model cache on EFS.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for inline code explanation, generation and refactoring powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin that adds an AI sidebar for summarizing notes and Q&A using Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama as an async chat endpoint with built-in rate limiting and admin UI.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama and adds session memory, PDF upload and voice input.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library for Ollama with LINQ-style streaming and Blazor sample app.
